Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Punch/Scattershot:




Nemesis Enforcer woke up, hearing Zardus transmission. " YES!  WHO IS THE 
BOT?  I'm the BOT!" he jumped up, doing a victory dance." 

He left the smashed up conference room, seein Dark One, Breakdown, and 
Scattershot dragging Stalker's dead body.

"Good work.  Zardus has left me in command so--"

"We know." Dark One said coldly.  "What do you want us to do with the body?"

"Decapitate it and put it in the lab." Nemesis ordered.  "Zardus may have a 
use for it."

"Very well..." Dark One said, taking out his energy blade and slashing down, 
Stalker's head rolling to Scattershot's feet, the psychotic robot putting it 
into subspace, the two Oblitercons dragging the headless body towards the 
lab."

---

Hiss, Pyro, and Scavenger walked out to see Nemesis Enforcer.

"Why are you in charge?" Pyro asked, stepping forward.

"Because I'm special!  The conference room, and," he stopped speaking, 
tilting his head to the smashed open access hatch, "are messed up.  Repair 
them, all of you!  I will ponder the existence of Cybertron on my throne."
